translated: Subhūti, in the intrinsic nature of a dream there is no standing or not standing.🔽In the intrinsic nature of an illusion there is no standing or not standing.

analyzed: mig yor gyi ngo bo nyid la ni gnas pa'am mi gnas pa med do //

analyzed: gzugs brnyan gyi ngo bo nyid la ni gnas pa'am mi gnas pa med do //

analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa'i sprul pa'i ngo bo nyid la ni gnas pa'am mi gnas pa med do //

original: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i phyir zhe na /

analyzed: gzugs brnyan gzugs brnyan @316a *// gyis stong pa'i phyir ro //

analyzed: rab 'byor / 'di lta ste /
translated: Subhūti, it is just as, for example,

original: tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i ngo bo nyid la ni gnas pa'am mi gnas pa med do //🔽bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i ngo bo nyid la ni gnas pa'am mi gnas pa med do //

translated: The intrinsic nature of the perfection of morality does not stand or not stand.🔽The intrinsic nature of the perfection of patience does not stand or not stand.

original: brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i ngo bo nyid la ni gnas pa'am mi gnas pa med do //
analyzed: brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i ngo bo nyid la ni gnas pa'am mi gnas pa med do //
translated: The intrinsic nature of the perfection of perseverance does not stand or not stand.

original: bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i ngo bo nyid la ni gnas pa'am mi gnas pa med do //
analyzed: bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i ngo bo nyid la ni gnas pa'am mi gnas pa med do //
translated: The intrinsic nature of the perfection of concentration does not stand or not stand.

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i ngo bo nyid la ni gnas pa'am mi gnas pa med do //
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i ngo bo nyid la ni gnas pa'am mi gnas pa med do //
translated: The intrinsic nature of the perfection of wisdom does not stand or not stand.

original: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: And why?

original: rab 'byor / de ni 'di ltar sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pas stong pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: rab 'byor / de ni 'di ltar sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pas stong pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Subhūti, it is because the perfection of giving is empty of the perfection of giving,

original: tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pas stong pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pas stong pa'i phyir ro //
translated: the perfection of morality is empty of the perfection of morality,

original: bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pas stong pa'i phyir ro //🔽brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pas stong pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pas stong pa'i phyir ro // brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pas stong pa'i phyir ro //
translated: the perfection of patience is empty of the perfection of patience,🔽the perfection of perseverance is empty of the perfection of perseverance,

original: bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsam gtan gyi @317a *//🔽pha rol tu phyin pas stong pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsam gtan gyi @317a *// pha rol tu phyin pas stong pa'i phyir ro //
translated: the perfection of concentration is empty of the perfection of concentration,

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas stong pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas stong pa'i phyir ro //
translated: and the perfection of wisdom is empty of the perfection of wisdom.

original: rab 'byor / 'di lta ste /🔽dper na / nang stong pa nyid ni gnas pa'ang ma yin /
analyzed: rab 'byor / 'di lta ste / dper na / nang stong pa nyid ni gnas pa'ang ma yin /

analyzed: rab 'byor / 'di lta ste / dper na / phyi stong pa nyid ni gnas pa'ang ma yin /

analyzed: rab 'byor / de bzhin du theg pa chen po de'ang gnas pa'ang ma yin /

analyzed: stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi ngo bo nyid la ni gnas pa'am mi gnas pa med do //

analyzed: don dam pa stong pa nyid kyi ngo bo nyid la ni gnas pa'am mi gnas pa med do //
translated: The intrinsic nature of ultimate emptiness is neither to be attended to nor not to be attended to.

original: 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyi ngo bo nyid la ni gnas pa'am mi gnas pa med do //
analyzed: 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyi ngo bo nyid la ni gnas pa'am mi gnas pa med do //
translated: The intrinsic nature of conditioned emptiness is neither to be attended to nor not to be attended to.

original: 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyi ngo bo nyid la ni gnas pa'am mi gnas pa med do //
analyzed: 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyi ngo bo nyid la ni gnas pa'am mi gnas pa med do //
translated: The intrinsic nature of unconditioned emptiness is neither to be attended to nor not to be attended to.

original: mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyi ngo bo nyid la ni gnas pa'am mi gnas pa med do //
analyzed: mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyi ngo bo nyid la ni gnas pa'am mi gnas pa med do //
translated: The nature of the emptiness of the unlimited is not something that is based or not based.

original: thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid kyi ngo bo nyid la ni gnas pa'am mi gnas pa med do //
analyzed: thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid kyi ngo bo nyid la ni gnas pa'am mi gnas pa med do //
translated: The nature of the emptiness of that which has neither beginning nor end is not something that is based or not based.

original: dor ba med pa stong pa nyid kyi ngo bo nyid la na gnas pa'am mi gnas pa med do //
analyzed: dor ba med pa stong pa nyid kyi ngo bo nyid la na gnas pa'am mi gnas pa med do //
translated: The nature of the emptiness of non-dispersal is not something that is based or not based.

original: rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi ngo bo nyid la ni gnas pa'am mi gnas pa med do //
analyzed: rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi ngo bo nyid la ni gnas pa'am mi gnas pa med do //
translated: The nature of the emptiness of inherent existence is not something that is based or not based.

original: chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyi ngo bo nyid la ni gnas pa'am mi gnas pa med do //
analyzed: chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyi ngo bo nyid la ni gnas pa'am mi gnas pa med do //
translated: The nature of the emptiness of all things is not something that is based or not based.

original: rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyi ngo bo nyid la ni gnas pa'am mi gnas pa med do //🔽mi dmigs @319a *//🔽pa stong pa nyid kyi ngo bo nyid la ni gnas pa'am mi gnas pa med do //
analyzed: rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyi ngo bo nyid la ni gnas pa'am mi gnas pa med do // mi dmigs @319a *// pa stong pa nyid kyi ngo bo nyid la ni gnas pa'am mi gnas pa med do //
translated: The nature of the emptiness of intrinsic defining characteristics is not something that is based or not based.🔽The nature of the emptiness of non-apprehension is not something that is based or not based.

original: dngos po med pa stong pa nyid kyi ngo bo nyid la ni gnas pa'am mi gnas pa med do //
analyzed: dngos po med pa stong pa nyid kyi ngo bo nyid la ni gnas pa'am mi gnas pa med do //
translated: The nature of the emptiness of the non-existent is not something that is based or not based.

original: ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi ngo bo nyid la ni gnas pa'am mi gnas pa med do //
analyzed: ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi ngo bo nyid la ni gnas pa'am mi gnas pa med do //
translated: The intrinsic nature of the emptiness of essential nature is not to be attended to or not to be attended to.🔽The intrinsic nature of the emptiness of non-apprehension is not to be attended to or not to be attended to.🔽The intrinsic nature of the emptiness of essential nature is not to be attended to or not to be attended to.

original: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi ngo bo nyid la ni gnas pa'am mi gnas pa med do //🔽de ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi ngo bo nyid la ni gnas pa'am mi gnas pa med do // de ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: The intrinsic nature of the emptiness of non-apprehension is not to be attended to or not to be attended to.

original: rab 'byor / de ni 'di ltar nang stong pa nyid nang stong pa nyid kyis stong pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: rab 'byor / de ni 'di ltar nang stong pa nyid nang stong pa nyid kyis stong pa'i phyir ro //
translated: The intrinsic nature of the emptiness of the essential nature of non-apprehension is not to be attended to or not to be attended to.

original: phyi stong pa nyid phyi stong pa nyid kyis stong pa'i phyir ro //🔽phyi nang stong pa nyid phyi nang stong pa nyid kyis stong pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: phyi stong pa nyid phyi stong pa nyid kyis stong pa'i phyir ro // phyi nang stong pa nyid phyi nang stong pa nyid kyis stong pa'i phyir ro //
translated: The intrinsic nature of the emptiness of the ultimate is not to be attended to or not to be attended to.🔽The intrinsic nature of the emptiness of the compounded is not to be attended to or not to be attended to.

original: stong pa nyid stong pa nyid stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyis stong pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: stong pa nyid stong pa nyid stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyis stong pa'i phyir ro //
translated: The intrinsic nature of the emptiness of the uncompounded is not to be attended to or not to be attended to.🔽The intrinsic nature of the emptiness of the very great is not to be attended to or not to be attended to.

original: chen po stong pa nyid chen po stong pa nyid kyis stong pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: chen po stong pa nyid chen po stong pa nyid kyis stong pa'i phyir ro //
translated: The intrinsic nature of the emptiness of the unlimited is not to be attended to or not to be attended to.🔽The intrinsic nature of the emptiness of the conditioned is not to be attended to or not to be attended to.🔽The intrinsic nature of the emptiness of the unconditioned is not to be attended to or not to be attended to.🔽The intrinsic nature of the emptiness of the beginningless and endless is not to be attended to or not to be attended to.🔽The intrinsic nature of the emptiness of non-rejection is not to be attended to or not to be attended to.🔽The intrinsic nature of the emptiness of inherent existence is not to be attended to or not to be attended to.🔽The intrinsic nature of the emptiness of all phenomena is not to be attended to or not to be attended to.🔽The intrinsic nature of the emptiness of its own characteristics is not to be attended to or not to be attended to.🔽The intrinsic nature of the emptiness of other phenomena is not to be attended to or not to be attended to.🔽The intrinsic nature of the emptiness of the non-apprehension of phenomena is not to be attended to or not to be attended to.🔽The intrinsic nature of the emptiness of essential nature is not to be attended to or not to be attended to.

original: don dam pa stong pa nyid don dam pa stong pa nyid kyis stong pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: don dam pa stong pa nyid don dam pa stong pa nyid kyis stong pa'i phyir ro //
translated: The intrinsic nature of the emptiness of non-apprehension is not to be attended to or not to be attended to.🔽The intrinsic

original: 'dus byas stong pa nyid 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyis stong pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: 'dus byas stong pa nyid 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyis stong pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because the emptiness of conditioned phenomena is empty of the emptiness of conditioned phenomena.

original: 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyis stong pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyis stong pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because the emptiness of unconditioned phenomena is empty of the emptiness of unconditioned phenomena.

original: mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyis stong pa'i phyir ro //🔽thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid kyis stong pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyis stong pa'i phyir ro // thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid kyis stong pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because the emptiness of what is beyond extremes is empty of the emptiness of what is beyond extremes.

original: dor ba med pa stong pa nyid dor ba med pa stong pa nyid kyis stong pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: dor ba med pa stong pa nyid dor ba med pa stong pa nyid kyis stong pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because the emptiness of what is not broken or discarded is empty of the emptiness of what is not broken or discarded.

original: rang bzhin stong pa nyid rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyis stong pa la phyir @319b ro //
analyzed: rang bzhin stong pa nyid rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyis stong pa la phyir @319b ro //
translated: because the emptiness of nature is empty of the emptiness of nature.

original: chos thams cad stong pa nyid chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyis stong pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: chos thams cad stong pa nyid chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyis stong pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because the emptiness of all phenomena is empty of the emptiness of all phenomena.

original: rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyis stong pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyis stong pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because the emptiness of its own mark is empty of the emptiness of its own mark.

original: mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid kyis stong pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid kyis stong pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because the emptiness of non-apprehension is empty of the emptiness of non-apprehension.

original: dngos po med pa stong pa nyid dngos po med pa stong pa nyid kyis stong pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: dngos po med pa stong pa nyid dngos po med pa stong pa nyid kyis stong pa'i phyir ro //

analyzed: ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyis stong pa'i phyir ro //

analyzed: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyis stong pa'i phyir ro //

original: mi gnas pa'ang ma yin no //🔽de ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: mi gnas pa'ang ma yin no // de ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: nor does it not remain.

original: rab 'byor / 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams kyi ngo bo nyid la ni gnas pa'am mi gnas pa med do //
analyzed: rab 'byor / 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams kyi ngo bo nyid la ni gnas pa'am mi gnas pa med do //
translated: If you ask why, Subhūti, it is because in the intrinsic nature of the noble truths there is no remaining or not remaining.

original: bsam gtan rnams kyi ngo bo nyid la ni gnas pa'am mi gnas pa med do //
analyzed: bsam gtan rnams kyi ngo bo nyid la ni gnas pa'am mi gnas pa med do //
translated: In the intrinsic nature of the concentrations there is no remaining or not remaining.

original: tshad med pa rnams kyi ngo bo nyid la ni gnas pa'am mi gnas pa med do //
analyzed: tshad med pa rnams kyi ngo bo nyid la ni gnas pa'am mi gnas pa med do //
translated: In the intrinsic nature of the immeasurables there is no remaining or not remaining.

original: gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyi ngo bo nyid la ni gnas pa'ang mi gnas pa med do //
analyzed: gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyi ngo bo nyid la ni gnas pa'ang mi gnas pa med do //
translated: The intrinsic nature of the formless absorptions is neither abiding nor non-abiding.

original: rnam par thar pa brgyad kyi ngo bo nyid la ni gnas pa'am mi gnas pa med do //
analyzed: rnam par thar pa brgyad kyi ngo bo nyid la ni gnas pa'am mi gnas pa med do //
translated: The intrinsic nature of the eight liberations is neither abiding nor non-abiding.

original: mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu'i ngo bo nyid la ni gnas pa'am mi gnas pa med do //
analyzed: mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu'i ngo bo nyid la ni gnas pa'am mi gnas pa med do //
translated: The intrinsic nature of the nine serial absorptions is neither abiding nor non-abiding.

original: rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa'i ngo bo nyid la ni gnas pa'am mi gnas pa med do //
analyzed: rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa'i ngo bo nyid la ni gnas pa'am mi gnas pa med do //
translated: The intrinsic nature of the emptiness, signlessness, and aspirationlessness gateways to liberation is neither abiding nor non-abiding.

original: mngon par shes pa rnams kyi ngo bo nyid la ni gnas pa'am mi gnas pa med do //
analyzed: mngon par shes pa rnams kyi ngo bo nyid la ni gnas pa'am mi gnas pa med do //
translated: The intrinsic nature of the clairvoyances is neither abiding nor non-abiding.

original: ting nge 'dzin rnams kyi ngo bo nyid la ni gnas pa 'am mi gnas pa med do //
analyzed: ting nge 'dzin rnams kyi ngo bo nyid la ni gnas pa 'am mi gnas pa med do //
translated: The intrinsic nature of the meditative stabilizations is neither abiding nor non-abiding.

original: gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyi ngo bo nyid la ni gnas pa 'am mi gnas pa med @322a *//
analyzed: gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyi ngo bo nyid la ni gnas pa 'am mi gnas pa med @322a *//
translated: The intrinsic nature of the dhāraṇī gateways is neither abiding nor non-abiding.

original: do // de ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: do // de ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: And why?

original: rab 'byor / de ni 'di ltar 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams kyis stong pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: rab 'byor / de ni 'di ltar 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams kyis stong pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Subhūti, it is because the noble truths are empty of the noble truths.

original: bsam gtan rnams bsam gtan rnams kyis stong pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: bsam gtan rnams bsam gtan rnams kyis stong pa'i phyir ro //
translated: The concentrations are empty of the concentrations.

analyzed: tshad med pa rnams tshad med pa rnams kyis stong pa'i phyir ro //
translated: The immeasurables are empty of the immeasurables.

analyzed: gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyis stong pa'i phyir ro //
translated: The formless absorptions are empty of the formless absorptions.

original: rnam par thar pa rnams rnam par thar pa rnams kyis stong pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: rnam par thar pa rnams rnam par thar pa rnams kyis stong pa'i phyir ro //

translated: The serial absorptions are empty of the serial absorptions.

analyzed: rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa /

original: rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pas stong pa'i phyir ro //🔽mngon par shes pa rnams mngon par shes pa rnams kyis stong pa'i phyir ro //🔽ting nge 'dzin rnams ting nge 'dzin rnams kyis stong pa'i phyir ro //

analyzed: theg pa de ni mi gnas par gnas pa'i tshul dang / bskyod du med pa'i tshul gyis gang du'ang gnas par 'gyur ba med do //
translated: that vehicle does not abide anywhere, in the manner of non-abiding, and in the manner of being unshakable.

original: rab 'byor / gang yang khyod kyis 'di skad du theg pa des su zhig 'byung bar 'gyur zhes smras pa ni theg pa des su'ang 'byung bar 'gyur ba med do //
analyzed: rab 'byor / gang yang khyod kyis 'di skad du theg pa des su zhig 'byung bar 'gyur zhes smras pa ni theg pa des su'ang 'byung bar 'gyur ba med do //
translated: The Lord: It is called the great vehicle.

original: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: It is called the great vehicle.🔽Subhuti: What is the name of this perfection of wisdom?🔽The Lord: It is the perfection of wisdom of the Bodhisattvas, the great beings.🔽It is the perfection of wisdom of the Bodhisattvas, the great beings.🔽Subhuti: What is the name of this vehicle?

original: rab 'byor / de ni 'di ltar theg pa de gang yin pa dang / gang 'byung bar 'gyur ba dang / gang gis 'byung bar 'gyur ba dang / gang nas 'byung bar 'gyur ba'i chos de dag thams cad med cing mi dmigs pa'i phyir te /
analyzed: rab 'byor / de ni 'di ltar theg pa de gang yin pa dang / gang 'byung bar 'gyur ba dang / gang gis 'byung bar 'gyur ba dang / gang nas 'byung bar 'gyur ba'i chos de dag thams cad med cing mi dmigs pa'i phyir te /
translated: The Lord: It is called the great vehicle.🔽It is called the great vehicle.🔽Subhuti: What is the name of this perfection of wisdom?🔽The Lord: It is the perfection of wisdom of the Bodhisattvas, the great beings.

original: de ltar chos thams cad med cing mi dmigs na /🔽chos gang zhig chos gang gis 'byung bar 'gyur /
analyzed: de ltar chos thams cad med cing mi dmigs na / chos gang zhig chos gang gis 'byung bar 'gyur /
translated: It is the perfection of wisdom of the Bodhisattvas, the great beings.

original: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: Subhuti: What is the name of this vehicle?🔽The Lord: It is called the great vehicle.

original: rab 'byor / de ni 'di ltar bdag shin tu rnam par dag pa dang / sems can shin tu rnam par dag pa dang / srog shin tu rnam par dag pa dang / 'gro ba shin tu rnam par dag pa dang / gso ba shin tu rnam par dag pa dang /🔽skyes bu shin tu rnam par dag pa dang / gang zag shin tu rnam par dag pa dang / shed can shin tu rnam par dag pa dang / shed bdag shin tu rnam par dag pa dang / byed pa po shin tu rnam par dag pa dang /
analyzed: rab 'byor / de ni 'di ltar bdag shin tu rnam par dag pa dang / sems can shin tu rnam par dag pa dang / srog shin tu rnam par dag pa dang / 'gro ba shin tu rnam par dag pa dang / gso ba shin tu rnam par dag pa dang / skyes bu shin tu rnam par dag pa dang / gang zag shin tu rnam par dag pa dang / shed can shin tu rnam par dag pa dang / shed bdag shin tu rnam par dag pa dang / byed pa po shin tu rnam par dag pa dang /
translated: Subhūti, it is because the self is utterly pure, sentient beings are utterly pure, living beings are utterly pure, living creatures are utterly pure, individuals are utterly pure,

original: tshor ba po shin tu rnam par dag pa dang / shes pa po shin tu rnam par dag pa dang / mthong @327a */
analyzed: tshor ba po shin tu rnam par dag pa dang / shes pa po shin tu rnam par dag pa dang / mthong @327a */
translated: persons are utterly pure, humankind are utterly pure, human beings are utterly pure, those who do, those who feel, those who know, and those who see are utterly pure.

original: ba po shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir mtha' las 'das pas bdag dmigs su med do //
analyzed: ba po shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir mtha' las 'das pas bdag dmigs su med do //
translated: The self is not apprehended because it transcends limits.

original: sems can dmigs su med do //
analyzed: sems can dmigs su med do //
translated: Sentient beings are not apprehended.🔽Living beings are not apprehended.

original: srog dmigs su med do //
analyzed: srog dmigs su med do //
translated: Living creatures are not apprehended.🔽Individuals are not apprehended.🔽Persons are not apprehended.🔽Humankind is not apprehended.

original: 'gro ba dmigs su med do //
analyzed: 'gro ba dmigs su med do //
translated: Human beings are not apprehended.🔽Those who do are not apprehended.

original: gso ba dmigs su med do //
analyzed: gso ba dmigs su med do //
translated: Those who feel are not apprehended.🔽Those who know are not apprehended.🔽Those who see are not apprehended.

original: skyes bu dmigs su med do //🔽gang zag dmigs su med do //
analyzed: skyes bu dmigs su med do // gang zag dmigs su med do //
translated: “There is no person to be observed.🔽There is no individual to be observed.🔽There is no human being to be observed.

original: shed can dmigs su med do //🔽shed bdag dmigs su med do //
analyzed: shed can dmigs su med do // shed bdag dmigs su med do //
translated: There is no human to be observed.

original: byed pa po dmigs su med do //
analyzed: byed pa po dmigs su med do //
translated: There is no agent to be observed.

original: tshor ba po dmigs su med do //
analyzed: tshor ba po dmigs su med do //
translated: There is no experiencer to be observed.

original: shes pa po dmigs su med do //
analyzed: shes pa po dmigs su med do //
translated: There is no knower to be observed.

original: mthong ba po dmigs su med do //
analyzed: mthong ba po dmigs su med do //
translated: There is no seer to be observed.

original: shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir chos kyi dbyings dmigs su med do //
analyzed: shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir chos kyi dbyings dmigs su med do //
translated: “The realm of phenomena is not to be observed, because it is utterly pure.

original: shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir de bzhin nyid dmigs su med do //🔽shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir yang dag pa'i mtha' dmigs su med do //
analyzed: shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir de bzhin nyid dmigs su med do // shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir yang dag pa'i mtha' dmigs su med do //
translated: Suchness is not to be observed, because it is utterly pure.🔽The very limit of reality is not to be observed, because it is utterly pure.

original: shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dbyings dmigs su med do //🔽shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir phung po rnams dmigs su med do //
analyzed: shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dbyings dmigs su med do // shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir phung po rnams dmigs su med do //
translated: The inconceivable realm is not to be observed, because it is utterly pure.🔽“The aggregates are not to be observed, because they are utterly pure.

original: shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir khams rnams dmigs su med do //
analyzed: shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir khams rnams dmigs su med do //
translated: The constituents are not to be observed, because they are utterly pure.

original: shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir skye mched rnams dmigs su med do //
analyzed: shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir skye mched rnams dmigs su med do //
translated: The sense fields are non-apprehensible because of their utter purity.

original: shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba dmigs su med do //
analyzed: shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba dmigs su med do //
translated: Dependent origination is non-apprehensible because of its utter purity.

original: shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dmigs @327b su med do //
analyzed: shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dmigs @327b su med do //
translated: The perfection of giving is non-apprehensible because of its utter purity.

original: shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dmigs su med do //🔽shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dmigs su med do //
analyzed: shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dmigs su med do // shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dmigs su med do //
translated: The perfection of morality is non-apprehensible because of its utter purity.🔽The perfection of patience is non-apprehensible because of its utter purity.

original: shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dmigs su med do //
analyzed: shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dmigs su med do //
translated: The perfection of perseverance is non-apprehensible because of its utter purity.

original: shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dmigs su med do //
analyzed: shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dmigs su med do //
translated: The perfection of concentration is non-apprehensible because of its utter purity.

original: shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dmigs su med do //
analyzed: shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dmigs su med do //
translated: The perfection of wisdom is non-apprehensible because of its utter purity.

original: shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir nang stong pa nyid dmigs su med do //🔽shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir phyi stong pa nyid dmigs su med do //
analyzed: shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir nang stong pa nyid dmigs su med do // shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir phyi stong pa nyid dmigs su med do //
translated: The emptiness of internal phenomena is non-apprehensible because of its utter purity.🔽The emptiness of external phenomena is non-apprehensible because of its utter purity.

original: shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir phyi nang stong pa nyid dmigs su med do //
analyzed: shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir phyi nang stong pa nyid dmigs su med do //
translated: The emptiness of both external and internal phenomena is non-apprehensible because of its utter purity.

original: shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dmigs su med do //
analyzed: shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dmigs su med do //
translated: The emptiness of emptiness is non-apprehensible because of its utter purity.

original: shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir chen po stong pa nyid dmigs su med do //🔽shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir don dam pa stong pa nyid dmigs su med do //
analyzed: shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir chen po stong pa nyid dmigs su med do // shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir don dam pa stong pa nyid dmigs su med do //
translated: The emptiness of great extent is non-apprehensible because of its utter purity.🔽The emptiness of ultimate reality is non-apprehensible because of its utter purity.

original: shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir 'dus byas stong pa nyid dmigs su med do //🔽shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dmigs su med do //
analyzed: shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir 'dus byas stong pa nyid dmigs su med do // shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dmigs su med do //
translated: The emptiness of conditioned phenomena is non-apprehensible because of its utter purity.🔽The emptiness of unconditioned phenomena is non-apprehensible because of its utter purity.

original: shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dmigs su med do //
analyzed: shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dmigs su med do //
translated: The emptiness of the unlimited is non-apprehensible because of its utter purity.

original: shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid dmigs su med do //🔽shin tu rnam par dag @328a *//🔽pa'i phyir dor ba med pa stong pa nyid dmigs su med do //
analyzed: shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid dmigs su med do // shin tu rnam par dag @328a *// pa'i phyir dor ba med pa stong pa nyid dmigs su med do //
translated: The emptiness of what is beginningless and endless is non-apprehensible because of the extreme purity of space.🔽The emptiness of the unlimited is non-apprehensible because of the extreme purity of space.🔽The emptiness of that which has neither been annihilated nor will be annihilated is non-apprehensible because of the extreme purity of space.

original: shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir rang bzhin stong pa nyid dmigs su med do //
analyzed: shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir rang bzhin stong pa nyid dmigs su med do //
translated: The emptiness of inherent existence is non-apprehensible because of the extreme purity of space.

analyzed: shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir chos thams cad stong pa nyid dmigs su med do //

analyzed: shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dmigs su med do //

original: shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid dmigs su med do //🔽shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir dngos po med pa stong pa nyid dmigs su med do //🔽shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dmigs su med do //
analyzed: shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid dmigs su med do //🔽shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir dngos po med pa stong pa nyid dmigs su med do //🔽shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dmigs su med do //
translated: The emptiness of all things is non-apprehensible because of the extreme purity of space.🔽The emptiness of all things

original: shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dmigs su med do //🔽shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams dmigs su med do //
analyzed: shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dmigs su med do // shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams dmigs su med do //
translated: The emptiness that is the nonexistence of an intrinsic nature is non-apprehensible because of its utter purity.🔽The applications of mindfulness are non-apprehensible because of their utter purity.

original: shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir yang dag par spong ba rnams dmigs su med do //
analyzed: shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir yang dag par spong ba rnams dmigs su med do //
translated: The right efforts are non-apprehensible because of their utter purity.

original: shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams dmigs su med do //🔽shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir dbang po rnams dmigs su med do //
analyzed: shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams dmigs su med do // shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir dbang po rnams dmigs su med do //
translated: The legs of miraculous power are non-apprehensible because of their utter purity.🔽The faculties are non-apprehensible because of their utter purity.

original: shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir stobs rnams dmigs su med do //
analyzed: shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir stobs rnams dmigs su med do //
translated: The powers are non-apprehensible because of their utter purity.

original: shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir byang chub kyi yan lag rnams dmigs su med do //
analyzed: shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir byang chub kyi yan lag rnams dmigs su med do //
translated: The limbs of awakening are non-apprehensible because of their utter purity.

original: shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir 'phags pa'i lam yan lag @328b brgyad pa dmigs su med do //
analyzed: shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir 'phags pa'i lam yan lag @328b brgyad pa dmigs su med do //
translated: The noble eightfold path is non-apprehensible because of its utter purity.

original: shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams dmigs su med do //
analyzed: shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams dmigs su med do //
translated: The noble truths are non-apprehensible because of their utter purity.

original: shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir bsam gtan rnams dmigs su med do //🔽shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir tshad med pa rnams dmigs su med do //
analyzed: shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir bsam gtan rnams dmigs su med do // shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir tshad med pa rnams dmigs su med do //
translated: The meditative stabilities are non-apprehensible because of their utter purity.🔽The immeasurable aspirations are non-apprehensible because of their utter purity.🔽The formless absorptions are non-apprehensible because of their utter purity.🔽The emptiness meditative stabilization is non-apprehensible because of its utter purity.

original: shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dmigs su med do //🔽shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir rnam par thar pa rnams dmigs su med do //
analyzed: shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dmigs su med do // shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir rnam par thar pa rnams dmigs su med do //
translated: The signless meditative stabilization is non-apprehensible because of its utter purity.🔽The wishless meditative stabilization is non-apprehensible because of its utter purity.🔽The applications of mindfulness are non-apprehensible because of their utter purity.

original: shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dmigs su med do //
analyzed: shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dmigs su med do //
translated: The correct exertions are non-apprehensible because of their utter purity.🔽The supports for miraculous ability are non-apprehensible because of their utter purity.🔽The faculties are non-apprehensible because of their utter purity.🔽The powers are non-apprehensible because of their utter purity.🔽The branches of enlightenment are non-apprehensible because of their utter purity.🔽The path is non-apprehensible because of its utter purity.

original: shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dmigs su med do //
analyzed: shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dmigs su med do //
translated: The fruits of monastic practice are non-apprehensible because of their utter purity.🔽The ten powers are non-apprehensible because of their utter purity.🔽The four fearlessnesses are non-apprehensible because of their utter purity.

original: shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir mngon par shes pa rnams dmigs su med do //
analyzed: shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir mngon par shes pa rnams dmigs su med do //
translated: The four detailed and thorough knowledges are non-apprehensible because of their utter purity.🔽The eighteen distinct attributes of a buddha are non-apprehensible because of their utter purity.🔽The knowledge of all aspects is non-apprehensible because of its utter purity.

original: shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir ting nge 'dzin rnams dmigs su med do //
analyzed: shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir ting nge 'dzin rnams dmigs su med do //
translated: The meditative stabilities are non-apprehensible because of their utter purity.

original: shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir gzungs kyi sgo rnams dmigs su med do //
analyzed: shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir gzungs kyi sgo rnams dmigs su med do //
translated: The dhāraṇī gateways are non-apprehensible because of their utter purity.

original: shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams dmigs su med do //
analyzed: shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams dmigs su med do //
translated: The powers of the tathāgatas are non-apprehensible because of their utter purity.

original: shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir mi 'jigs pa rnams dmigs su med do //
analyzed: shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir mi 'jigs pa rnams dmigs su med do //
translated: The fearlessnesses are non-apprehensible because of their utter purity.

original: shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir so so yang dag par rig pa rnams dmigs su med do //
analyzed: shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir so so yang dag par rig pa rnams dmigs su med do //
translated: The detailed and thorough knowledges are non-apprehensible because of their utter purity.

original: shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir snying rje chen po dmigs su med do //
analyzed: shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir snying rje chen po dmigs su med do //
translated: Great compassion is non-apprehensible because of its utter purity.

original: @329a *// shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad dmigs su med do //🔽shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir rgyun du zhugs pa dmigs su med do //
analyzed: @329a *// shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad dmigs su med do // shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir rgyun du zhugs pa dmigs su med do //
translated: The eighteen distinct attributes of a buddha are non-apprehensible because of their utter purity.🔽One who has entered the stream is non-apprehensible because of its utter purity.

original: shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir lan cig phyir 'ong ba dmigs su med do //
analyzed: shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir lan cig phyir 'ong ba dmigs su med do //
translated: One who is tied to one more rebirth is non-apprehensible because of its utter purity.

original: shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir phyir mi 'ong ba dmigs su med do //
analyzed: shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir phyir mi 'ong ba dmigs su med do //
translated: The non-returner is non-apprehensible, owing to the extreme purity of form.

original: shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir dgra bcom pa dmigs su med do //
analyzed: shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir dgra bcom pa dmigs su med do //
translated: The arhat is non-apprehensible, owing to the extreme purity of form.

original: shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir rang sangs rgyas dmigs su med do //
analyzed: shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir rang sangs rgyas dmigs su med do //
translated: The pratyekabuddha is non-apprehensible, owing to the extreme purity of form.

original: shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dmigs su med do //
analyzed: shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dmigs su med do //
translated: The bodhisattva is non-apprehensible, owing to the extreme purity of form.

original: shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dmigs su med do //
analyzed: shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dmigs su med do //
translated: The tathāgata is non-apprehensible, owing to the extreme purity of form.

original: shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu dmigs su med do //
analyzed: shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu dmigs su med do //
translated: The fruit of entering the stream is non-apprehensible, owing to the extreme purity of form.

original: shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dmigs su med do //
analyzed: shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dmigs su med do //
translated: The fruit of being tied to one more rebirth is non-apprehensible, owing to the extreme purity of form.

original: shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dmigs su med do //
analyzed: shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dmigs su med do //
translated: The fruit of no longer being subject to rebirth is non-apprehensible, owing to the extreme purity of form.

original: shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir dgra bcom pa nyid dmigs su med do //
analyzed: shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir dgra bcom pa nyid dmigs su med do //
translated: Arhatship is non-apprehensible, owing to the extreme purity of form.

original: shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir rang byang chub dmigs su med do //
analyzed: shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir rang byang chub dmigs su med do //
translated: “The pratyekabuddha’s awakening is non-apprehensible because of its utter purity.

original: shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid dmigs su med do //
analyzed: shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid dmigs su med do //
translated: “The knowledge of path aspects is non-apprehensible because of its utter purity.

original: shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir rnam pa @329b thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dmigs su med do //🔽shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir skye ba med pa dmigs su med do //
analyzed: shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir rnam pa @329b thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dmigs su med do // shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir skye ba med pa dmigs su med do //
translated: “The knowledge of all aspects is non-apprehensible because of its utter purity.🔽“Non-production is non-apprehensible because of its utter purity.

original: shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir 'gag pa med pa dmigs su med do //🔽shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dmigs su med do //🔽shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir rnam par byang ba med pa dmigs su med do //
analyzed: shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir 'gag pa med pa dmigs su med do // shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dmigs su med do // shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir rnam par byang ba med pa dmigs su med do //
translated: “Non-stopping is non-apprehensible because of its utter purity.🔽“Non-affliction is non-apprehensible because of its utter purity.🔽“Non-purification is non-apprehensible because of its utter purity.

original: shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir mngon par 'du bya ba med pa dmigs su med do //
analyzed: shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir mngon par 'du bya ba med pa dmigs su med do //
translated: “Non-conditioning is non-apprehensible because of its utter purity.

original: shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir sngon gyi mtha' dmigs su med do //
analyzed: shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir sngon gyi mtha' dmigs su med do //
translated: “The past limit is non-apprehensible because of its utter purity.

original: shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir phyi ma'i mtha' dmigs su med do //
analyzed: shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir phyi ma'i mtha' dmigs su med do //
translated: The future limit is non-apprehensible because of its utter purity.

original: shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir da ltar byung ba dmigs su med do //🔽shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir 'ong ba dmigs su med do //
analyzed: shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir da ltar byung ba dmigs su med do // shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir 'ong ba dmigs su med do //
translated: The present is non-apprehensible because of its utter purity.🔽Coming is non-apprehensible because of its utter purity.

original: shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir 'gro ba dmigs su med do //
analyzed: shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir 'gro ba dmigs su med do //
translated: Going is non-apprehensible because of its utter purity.

original: shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir gnas pa dmigs su med do //🔽shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir 'chi 'pho dmigs su med do //
analyzed: shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir gnas pa dmigs su med do // shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir 'chi 'pho dmigs su med do //
translated: Abiding is non-apprehensible because of its utter purity.🔽Death and rebirth are non-apprehensible because of their utter purity.

original: shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir skye ba dmigs su med do //
analyzed: shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir skye ba dmigs su med do //
translated: Birth is non-apprehensible because of its utter purity.

original: shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir 'grib pa dmigs su med do //
analyzed: shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir 'grib pa dmigs su med do //
translated: Diminution is non-apprehensible because of its utter purity.

original: shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir 'phel ba dmigs su med do //
analyzed: shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir 'phel ba dmigs su med do //
translated: Increase is non-apprehensible because of its utter purity.

original: gang mi dmigs pa thams cad dmigs su med pa yin zhe na /
analyzed: gang mi dmigs pa thams cad dmigs su med pa yin zhe na /
translated: “What is the non-apprehension of all non-apprehensions?”

original: chos kyi dbyings mi dmigs pas chos kyi dbyings dmigs su med do //
analyzed: chos kyi dbyings mi dmigs pas chos kyi dbyings dmigs su med do //
translated: The dharma-constituent is non-apprehensible because of the non-apprehension of the dharma-constituent.

original: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: And why?

original: rab 'byor / chos kyi dbyings dmigs @330a *//
analyzed: rab 'byor / chos kyi dbyings dmigs @330a *//
translated: Subhūti, the dharma-constituent,

original: su med pa ni dmigs pa'ang ma yin /
analyzed: su med pa ni dmigs pa'ang ma yin /
translated: which is not apprehended, is not an object,

original: mi dmigs pa'ang ma yin no //
analyzed: mi dmigs pa'ang ma yin no //
translated: and is not non-object.

original: de bzhin nyid mi dmigs pas de bzhin nyid dmigs su med do //
analyzed: de bzhin nyid mi dmigs pas de bzhin nyid dmigs su med do //
translated: Suchness is not apprehended, so suchness is not an object.

original: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: Why is that?

original: rab 'byor / de bzhin nyid dmigs su med pa ni dmigs pa'ang ma yin /
analyzed: rab 'byor / de bzhin nyid dmigs su med pa ni dmigs pa'ang ma yin /
translated: Subhūti, suchness, which is not apprehended, is not an object,

original: mi dmigs pa'ang ma yin no //
analyzed: mi dmigs pa'ang ma yin no //
translated: and is not non-object.

analyzed: yang dag pa'i mtha' mi dmigs pas yang dag pa'i mtha' dmigs su med do //
translated: The very limit of reality is not apprehended, so the very limit of reality is not an object.

original: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: Why is that?

analyzed: rab 'byor / yang dag pa'i mtha' dmigs su med pa ni dmigs pa'ang ma yin /
translated: Subhūti, the very limit of reality, which is not apprehended, is not an object,

original: mi dmigs pa'ang ma yin no //
analyzed: mi dmigs pa'ang ma yin no //
translated: and is not non-object.

original: bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dbyings mi dmigs pas bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dbyings dmigs su med do //
analyzed: bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dbyings mi dmigs pas bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dbyings dmigs su med do //

original: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: Why is that?

analyzed: rab 'byor / bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dbyings dmigs su med pa ni dmigs pa'ang ma yin /

analyzed: mi dmigs pa'ang ma yin no //

analyzed: phung po dang khams dang skye mched mi dmigs pas phung po dang khams dang skye mched dmigs su med do //

analyzed: de ci'i phyir zhe na /

translated: because of the emptiness of ultimate reality, the ninth level is non-apprehensible;🔽because of the emptiness of conditioned phenomena, the ninth level is non-apprehensible;🔽because of the emptiness of unconditioned phenomena, the ninth level is non-apprehensible;

original: stong pa nyid kyi phyir sa dgu pa dmigs su med do //🔽'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyi phyir sa dgu pa dmigs su med do //🔽mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir sa dgu pa dmigs su med do //
analyzed: stong pa nyid kyi phyir sa dgu pa dmigs su med do // 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyi phyir sa dgu pa dmigs su med do // mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir sa dgu pa dmigs su med do //
translated: because of the emptiness of the unlimited, the ninth level is non-apprehensible;🔽because of the emptiness of that which has neither beginning nor end, the ninth level is non-apprehensible;🔽because of the emptiness of non-dispersal, the ninth level is non-apprehensible;

original: thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir sa dgu pa dmigs su med do //
analyzed: thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir sa dgu pa dmigs su med do //
translated: because of the emptiness of inherent existence, the ninth level is non-apprehensible;🔽because of the emptiness of all things, the ninth level is non-apprehensible;🔽because of the emptiness of specific characteristics, the ninth level is non-apprehensible.

original: dor ba med pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir sa dgu pa dmigs su med do //
analyzed: dor ba med pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir sa dgu pa dmigs su med do //
translated: The ninth level is non-apprehensible because of the emptiness of non-repudiation.

original: rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir sa dgu pa dmigs su med do //
analyzed: rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir sa dgu pa dmigs su med do //
translated: The ninth level is non-apprehensible because of the emptiness of nature.

original: chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyi phyir sa dgu pa dmigs su med do //
analyzed: chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyi phyir sa dgu pa dmigs su med do //
translated: The ninth level is non-apprehensible because of the emptiness of all phenomena.

original: rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir sa dgu pa dmigs su med do //
analyzed: rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir sa dgu pa dmigs su med do //
translated: The ninth level is non-apprehensible because of the emptiness of specific characteristics.

original: mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir sa dgu pa dmigs su med do //🔽dngos po med pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir sa dgu pa dmigs su med do //
analyzed: mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir sa dgu pa dmigs su med do // dngos po med pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir sa dgu pa dmigs su med do //
translated: The ninth level is non-apprehensible because of the emptiness of non-apprehension.🔽The ninth level is non-apprehensible because of the emptiness of non-entities.

original: ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir sa dgu pa dmigs su med do //
analyzed: ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir sa dgu pa dmigs su med do //
translated: The ninth level is non-apprehensible because of the emptiness of essential nature.

original: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir sa dgu pa dmigs su med do //🔽nang stong pa nyid kyi phyir sa bcu pa dmigs su med do //
analyzed: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir sa dgu pa dmigs su med do // nang stong pa nyid kyi phyir sa bcu pa dmigs su med do //
translated: The ninth level is non-apprehensible because of the emptiness of the essential nature of non-entities.🔽The tenth level is non-apprehensible because of the emptiness of internal phenomena.

original: phyi stong pa nyid kyi phyir sa bcu pa dmigs su med do //
analyzed: phyi stong pa nyid kyi phyir sa bcu pa dmigs su med do //
translated: The tenth level is non-apprehensible because of the emptiness of external phenomena.

original: phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi phyir sa bcu pa dmigs su med do //
analyzed: phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi phyir sa bcu pa dmigs su med do //
translated: The tenth level is non-apprehensible because of the emptiness of the external and the emptiness of the internal.

original: stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir sa bcu pa dmigs su med do //
analyzed: stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir sa bcu pa dmigs su med do //
translated: The tenth level is non-apprehensible because of the emptiness of emptiness.

original: chen po stong pa nyid kyi phyir sa bcu pa dmigs su med do //
analyzed: chen po stong pa nyid kyi phyir sa bcu pa dmigs su med do //
translated: The tenth level is non-apprehensible because of the emptiness of great extent.

original: don dam pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir sa bcu pa dmigs su med do //🔽'dus byas stong pa nyid kyi phyir sa bcu pa dmigs @342b su med do //
analyzed: don dam pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir sa bcu pa dmigs su med do // 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyi phyir sa bcu pa dmigs @342b su med do //
translated: The tenth level is non-apprehensible because of the emptiness of ultimate reality.🔽The tenth level is non-apprehensible because of the emptiness of conditioned phenomena.

original: 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyi phyir sa bcu pa dmigs su med do //
analyzed: 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyi phyir sa bcu pa dmigs su med do //
translated: The tenth level is non-apprehensible because of the emptiness of unconditioned phenomena.

original: mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir sa bcu pa dmigs su med do //🔽thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir sa bcu pa dmigs su med do //
analyzed: mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir sa bcu pa dmigs su med do // thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir sa bcu pa dmigs su med do //
translated: The tenth level is non-apprehensible because of the emptiness of the unlimited.🔽The tenth level is non-apprehensible because of the emptiness of that which has neither beginning nor end.

original: dor ba med pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir sa bcu pa dmigs su med do //
analyzed: dor ba med pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir sa bcu pa dmigs su med do //
translated: The tenth level is non-apprehensible because of the emptiness of non-dispersal.

original: rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir sa bcu pa dmigs su med do //
analyzed: rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir sa bcu pa dmigs su med do //
translated: The tenth level is non-apprehensible because of the emptiness of inherent existence.

original: chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyi phyir sa bcu pa dmigs su med do //
analyzed: chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyi phyir sa bcu pa dmigs su med do //
translated: Because all phenomena are empty, the tenth level is non-apprehensible,

original: rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir sa bcu pa dmigs su med do //
analyzed: rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir sa bcu pa dmigs su med do //
translated: and because of the emptiness of its own mark, the tenth level is non-apprehensible.

original: mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir sa bcu pa dmigs su med do //🔽dngos po med pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir sa bcu pa dmigs su med do //
analyzed: mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir sa bcu pa dmigs su med do // dngos po med pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir sa bcu pa dmigs su med do //
translated: Because of the emptiness of non-apprehension, the tenth level is non-apprehensible,🔽and because of the emptiness of a thing’s non-existence, the tenth level is non-apprehensible.

original: ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir sa bcu pa dmigs su med do //
analyzed: ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir sa bcu pa dmigs su med do //
translated: Because of the emptiness of essential nature, the tenth level is non-apprehensible,

original: dngos pa med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir sa bcu pa dmigs su med do //
analyzed: dngos pa med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir sa bcu pa dmigs su med do //
translated: and because of the emptiness of the non-existence of essential nature, the tenth level is non-apprehensible.

original: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: And why?

original: rab 'byor / shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir sa dang po dmigs su med pa ni /🔽dmigs pa 'ang ma yin /
analyzed: rab 'byor / shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir sa dang po dmigs su med pa ni / dmigs pa 'ang ma yin /

analyzed: mi dmigs pa'ang ma yin no //

analyzed: shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir sa gnyis pa dmigs su med pa ni / dmigs pa 'ang ma yin /
translated: The second level, which is non-apprehensible,

original: mi dmigs pa'ang ma yin no //
analyzed: mi dmigs pa'ang ma yin no //
translated: is neither apprehended nor non-apprehended.

analyzed: shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir sa gsum pa dmigs su med pa ni / dmigs pa'ang ma yin /

analyzed: dmigs pa'ang ma yin /

analyzed: shin tu rnam par dag pa nye bar bzung na /

analyzed: bcom ldan 'das /

analyzed: bcom ldan 'das /

original: 'di lta ste /
analyzed: 'di lta ste /

analyzed: dper na / nam mkha' ni dus gsum mnyam pa nyid kyi slad du / sngon gyi mtha' mi dmigs / phyi ma'i mtha' mi dmigs /

original: dbus mi dmigs so //
analyzed: dbus mi dmigs so //

original: bcom ldan 'das /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das /
translated: Blessed One,

original: 'di lta ste /
analyzed: 'di lta ste /
translated: it is like this:

analyzed: pha rol tu phyin pa drug po 'di dag ni /

analyzed: 'di lta ste /
