analyzed: dpa' bar 'gro ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / rin chen phyag rgya'i ting nge 'dzin dang / sengge rnam par rtse ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / zla ba bzang po'i ting nge 'dzin dang / zla ba'i rgyal mtshan dpal gyi ting nge 'dzin dang / chos thams cad las shin tu 'phags pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang /
translated: They are the heroic meditative stabilization, the precious seal meditative stabilization, the lion’s play meditative stabilization, the good moon meditative stabilization, the moon victory banner glory meditative stabilization, the meditative stabilization that is superior to all dharmas,

original: chos thams cad kyi phyag rgya'i ting nge 'dzin dang / spyi gtsug rnam par lta ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / chos kyi dbyings su nges pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang / nges pa'i rgyal mtshan dpal gyi ting nge 'dzin dang / rdo rje'i ting nge 'dzin dang /🔽chos thams cad la 'jug pa'i phyag rgya'i ting nge 'dzin dang / ting nge 'dzin la rgyal po ltar rab tu gnas pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang / 'od zer rab tu 'gyed pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang / dpung rnam par bkod pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang /
analyzed: chos thams cad kyi phyag rgya'i ting nge 'dzin dang / spyi gtsug rnam par lta ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / chos kyi dbyings su nges pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang / nges pa'i rgyal mtshan dpal gyi ting nge 'dzin dang / rdo rje'i ting nge 'dzin dang / chos thams cad la 'jug pa'i phyag rgya'i ting nge 'dzin dang / ting nge 'dzin la rgyal po ltar rab tu gnas pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang / 'od zer rab tu 'gyed pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang / dpung rnam par bkod pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang /
translated: the samādhi of the seal of all phenomena, the samādhi of looking at the crown of the head, the samādhi of certainty in the realm of phenomena, the samādhi of the glory of the banner of certainty, the vajra samādhi,🔽the samādhi of the seal that engages with all phenomena, the samādhi of remaining like a king in samādhi, the samādhi of emitting light rays, the samādhi of the arrayed army,

original: yang dag par 'phags pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang / nges pa'i tshig la gdon mi za bar 'jug pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang / tshig bla dvags la yang dag par @347b 'jug pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang / phyogs rnam par lta ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /
analyzed: yang dag par 'phags pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang / nges pa'i tshig la gdon mi za bar 'jug pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang / tshig bla dvags la yang dag par @347b 'jug pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang / phyogs rnam par lta ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /
translated: the samādhi of the exalted, the samādhi of engaging without doubt in etymologies, the samādhi of engaging correctly in definitions, the samādhi of looking in all directions,

original: phyag rgya yongs su 'dzin pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang / nyams pa med pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang / chos thams cad yang dag par 'du ba rgya mtsho'i phyag rgya'i ting nge 'dzin dang / nam mkha' rgyas par 'gengs pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang / rdo rje dkyil 'khor gyi ting nge 'dzin dang /
analyzed: phyag rgya yongs su 'dzin pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang / nyams pa med pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang / chos thams cad yang dag par 'du ba rgya mtsho'i phyag rgya'i ting nge 'dzin dang / nam mkha' rgyas par 'gengs pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang / rdo rje dkyil 'khor gyi ting nge 'dzin dang /
translated: the mudra of holding samadhi, the samadhi of non-degeneration, the samadhi of the ocean mudra of the perfect gathering of all dharmas, the samadhi of filling the sky, the vajra mandala samadhi,

original: rgyal mtshan rtse mo'i dpung rgyan gyi ting nge 'dzin dang / dbang po'i dpal gyi ting nge 'dzin dang / rgyun gyi rjes su song ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / sengge rnam par bsgyings pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang / snrel zhi'i ting nge 'dzin dang /
analyzed: rgyal mtshan rtse mo'i dpung rgyan gyi ting nge 'dzin dang / dbang po'i dpal gyi ting nge 'dzin dang / rgyun gyi rjes su song ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / sengge rnam par bsgyings pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang / snrel zhi'i ting nge 'dzin dang /
translated: the samadhi of the victory banner's crest ornament, the samadhi of the glory of the senses, the samadhi of following the stream, the samadhi of the lion's yawn, the samadhi of the lattice,

original: nyon mongs pa spong ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / rnam par snang ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / 'tshol ba med pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang / gnas la brten pa med pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang / sems med pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang / dri ma med pa'i sgron ma'i ting nge 'dzin dang /
analyzed: nyon mongs pa spong ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / rnam par snang ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / 'tshol ba med pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang / gnas la brten pa med pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang / sems med pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang / dri ma med pa'i sgron ma'i ting nge 'dzin dang /
translated: the samadhi of the abandonment of afflictions, the samadhi of complete illumination, the samadhi of no searching, the samadhi of no reliance on abodes, the samadhi of no mind, the samadhi of the stainless lamp,

original: 'od mtha' yas pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang / 'od byed pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang / kun tu snang ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / dag pa dam pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang / 'od dri ma med pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang / dga' ba byed pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang /
analyzed: 'od mtha' yas pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang / 'od byed pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang / kun tu snang ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / dag pa dam pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang / 'od dri ma med pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang / dga' ba byed pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang /
translated: the samadhi of infinite light, the samadhi of the light maker, the samadhi of universal illumination, the samadhi of supreme purity, the samadhi of stainless light, the samadhi of the creator of joy,

original: glog gi sgron ma'i ting nge 'dzin dang / zad mi shes pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang / mi 'pham pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang / gzi brjid yod pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang / zad pa dang bral ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / mi g-yo ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /
analyzed: glog gi sgron ma'i ting nge 'dzin dang / zad mi shes pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang / mi 'pham pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang / gzi brjid yod pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang / zad pa dang bral ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / mi g-yo ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /
translated: the light lamp meditative stabilization, the inexhaustible meditative stabilization, the unvanquished meditative stabilization, the existent splendor meditative stabilization, the free from exhaustion meditative stabilization, the unmoving meditative stabilization,

original: 'jig pa med pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang / @348a *//
analyzed: 'jig pa med pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang / @348a *//
translated: the non-destruction meditative stabilization,

original: nyi ma'i sgron ma'i ting nge 'dzin dang / zla ba dri ma med pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang / shes rab sgron ma'i ting nge 'dzin dang / snang ba gsal ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / snang ba byed pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang / bya ba byed pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang /
analyzed: nyi ma'i sgron ma'i ting nge 'dzin dang / zla ba dri ma med pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang / shes rab sgron ma'i ting nge 'dzin dang / snang ba gsal ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / snang ba byed pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang / bya ba byed pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang /
translated: the sun lamp meditative stabilization, the stainless moon meditative stabilization, the wisdom lamp meditative stabilization, the clear light meditative stabilization, the light-maker meditative stabilization, the function-maker meditative stabilization,

original: ye shes dpal gyi ting nge 'dzin dang / rdo rje lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin dang / sems gnas pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang / kun tu snang ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / rab tu gnas pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang / rin chen mtha'i ting nge 'dzin dang /🔽chos dam pa'i phyag rgya'i ting nge 'dzin dang / chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid kyi ting nge 'dzin dang / dga' ba spong ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / chos kyis 'phags pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang / rnam par 'thor ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /
analyzed: ye shes dpal gyi ting nge 'dzin dang / rdo rje lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin dang / sems gnas pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang / kun tu snang ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / rab tu gnas pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang / rin chen mtha'i ting nge 'dzin dang / chos dam pa'i phyag rgya'i ting nge 'dzin dang / chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid kyi ting nge 'dzin dang / dga' ba spong ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / chos kyis 'phags pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang / rnam par 'thor ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /
translated: the concentration of the splendor of pristine consciousness, the vajra-like concentration, the concentration of mental stability, the concentration of universal illumination, the concentration of firm abiding, the concentration of the jewel limit,🔽the concentration of the seal of the sublime Dharma, the concentration of the equality of all phenomena, the concentration of abandoning joy, the concentration of the exalted Dharma, the concentration of scattering,

original: chos thams cad kyi tshig rab tu 'byed pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang / yi ge mnyam par 'god pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang / yi ge dang bral ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / dmigs pa gcod pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang / 'gyur ba med pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang /
analyzed: chos thams cad kyi tshig rab tu 'byed pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang / yi ge mnyam par 'god pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang / yi ge dang bral ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / dmigs pa gcod pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang / 'gyur ba med pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang /
translated: the concentration of discerning the words of all phenomena, the concentration of arranging letters in equality, the concentration free from letters, the concentration of cutting off focal objects, the concentration of immutability,🔽and the concentration of the absence of conceptualization.

original: rnam pa med pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang / ming nges par 'jug pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang / gnas med par spyod pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang / rab rib med pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang / spyod pa dang ldan pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang / g-yo ba med pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang /
analyzed: rnam pa med pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang / ming nges par 'jug pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang / gnas med par spyod pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang / rab rib med pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang / spyod pa dang ldan pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang / g-yo ba med pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang /
translated: the samādhi of no aspect, the samādhi of the ascertainment of names, the samādhi of conduct without a location, the samādhi of no cataracts, the samādhi of having conduct, the samādhi of no movement,

original: yul las rgal ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / yon tan thams @348b cad kyi tshogs su gyur pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang / sems med par gnas pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang / dge ba'i me tog rgyas shing gsal ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / byang chub kyi yan lag yod pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang /
analyzed: yul las rgal ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / yon tan thams @348b cad kyi tshogs su gyur pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang / sems med par gnas pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang / dge ba'i me tog rgyas shing gsal ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / byang chub kyi yan lag yod pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang /
translated: the samādhi of transcending objects, the samādhi that becomes the accumulation of all good qualities, the samādhi of remaining without mind, the samādhi of the blooming and shining of virtuous flowers, and the samādhi of having the branches of awakening.

original: spobs pa mtha' yas pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang / mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang / chos thams cad las 'da' ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / yongs su gcod pa byed pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang / nem nur rnam par sel ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /
analyzed: spobs pa mtha' yas pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang / mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang / chos thams cad las 'da' ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / yongs su gcod pa byed pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang / nem nur rnam par sel ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /
translated: the samadhi of infinite eloquence, the samadhi of equality with the unequaled, the samadhi of transcending all phenomena, the samadhi of complete severance, the samadhi of dispelling doubt,🔽the samadhi of no location, the samadhi of single array, the samadhi of accomplishing aspects, the samadhi of becoming one, the samadhi of elimination,

original: gnas su bya ba med pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang / gcig tu rnam par bkod pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang / rnam pa mngon par bsgrub pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang / rnam pa gcig tu gyur pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang / rnam par 'dor ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /
analyzed: gnas su bya ba med pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang / gcig tu rnam par bkod pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang / rnam pa mngon par bsgrub pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang / rnam pa gcig tu gyur pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang / rnam par 'dor ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /
translated: and the samadhi of non-abiding.

original: rtog pas srid pa'i gzhi thams cad khong du chud pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang / brda dang sgra la 'jug pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang / sgra dbyangs kyi yi ge dang bral ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / sgron ma 'bar pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang /🔽mtshan nyid yongs su sbyong ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / mngon par dmigs pa med pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang / rnam pa'i mchog thams cad dang ldan pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang / bde ba dang sdug bsngal thams cad la mngon par dga' ba med pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang /
analyzed: rtog pas srid pa'i gzhi thams cad khong du chud pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang / brda dang sgra la 'jug pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang / sgra dbyangs kyi yi ge dang bral ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / sgron ma 'bar pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang / mtshan nyid yongs su sbyong ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / mngon par dmigs pa med pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang / rnam pa'i mchog thams cad dang ldan pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang / bde ba dang sdug bsngal thams cad la mngon par dga' ba med pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang /
translated: the meditative absorption of realizing the basis of all existence through conceptualization, the meditative absorption of engaging with symbols and sounds, the meditative absorption free from the syllables of melodious sounds, the meditative absorption of the blazing lamp,🔽the meditative absorption of purifying characteristics, the meditative absorption of non-apprehending, the meditative absorption endowed with all supreme aspects, the meditative absorption of not delighting in any happiness or suffering,

original: zad mi shes pa'i za ma tog gi ting nge 'dzin dang / gzungs kyi glo gros kyi ting nge 'dzin dang / yang dag pa dang log pa thams cad yang @349a *//
analyzed: zad mi shes pa'i za ma tog gi ting nge 'dzin dang / gzungs kyi glo gros kyi ting nge 'dzin dang / yang dag pa dang log pa thams cad yang @349a *//
translated: the meditative absorption of the inexhaustible casket, the meditative absorption of the dhāraṇī of intelligence, the meditative absorption of all that is right and wrong,

original: dag par sel ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / 'gal ba dang 'gog pa thams cad yang dag par zhi bar byed pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang / mthun pa dang 'gal ba med pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang / 'od dri ma med pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang /
analyzed: dag par sel ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / 'gal ba dang 'gog pa thams cad yang dag par zhi bar byed pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang / mthun pa dang 'gal ba med pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang / 'od dri ma med pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang /
translated: the samādhi of pure elimination, the samādhi that pacifies all conflicts and obstructions, the samādhi of non-opposition and non-conflict, the samādhi of stainless light,

original: snying po dang ldan pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang / zla ba dri ma med par rgyas pa'i 'od kyi ting nge 'dzin dang / glog gi 'od kyi ting nge 'dzin dang / rgyan chen po'i ting nge 'dzin dang / rnam pa thams cad du 'od byed pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang /
analyzed: snying po dang ldan pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang / zla ba dri ma med par rgyas pa'i 'od kyi ting nge 'dzin dang / glog gi 'od kyi ting nge 'dzin dang / rgyan chen po'i ting nge 'dzin dang / rnam pa thams cad du 'od byed pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang /
translated: the samādhi of possessing the essence, the samādhi of the light of the stainless full moon, the samādhi of the light of lightning, the samādhi of great ornaments, the samādhi of the light that illuminates all aspects,

original: ting nge 'dzin mnyam pa nyid kyi ting nge 'dzin dang / rdul med cing rdul dang bral ba'i tshul dang ldan pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang / nyon mongs pa med par yang dag par gzhol ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / nyon mongs pa dang bcas pa thams cad nyon mongs pa med par yang dag par gzhol ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /
analyzed: ting nge 'dzin mnyam pa nyid kyi ting nge 'dzin dang / rdul med cing rdul dang bral ba'i tshul dang ldan pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang / nyon mongs pa med par yang dag par gzhol ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / nyon mongs pa dang bcas pa thams cad nyon mongs pa med par yang dag par gzhol ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /
translated: the sameness of meditative absorption, the meditative absorption endowed with the mode of being free from and beyond dust, the meditative absorption that is correctly directed toward the absence of afflictions, the meditative absorption that is correctly directed toward the absence of afflictions in all that is associated with afflictions,

original: gnas dmigs su med pa la brtson pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang / de bzhin nyid la gnas shing sems med pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang / lus kyi skyon yang dag par sel ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / ngag gi skyon rnam par 'jig pas nam mkha' ltar gyur pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang /
analyzed: gnas dmigs su med pa la brtson pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang / de bzhin nyid la gnas shing sems med pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang / lus kyi skyon yang dag par sel ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / ngag gi skyon rnam par 'jig pas nam mkha' ltar gyur pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang /
translated: the meditative absorption that is applied to the nonapprehending of a location, the meditative absorption that abides in suchness and is devoid of mind, the meditative absorption that eliminates the faults of the body, the meditative absorption that becomes like space by destroying the faults of speech,

original: yid kyi skyon yang dag par sel ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / nam mkha' ltar chags pa med pas rnam par grol zhing gos pa med pa'i ting nge 'dzin te /
analyzed: yid kyi skyon yang dag par sel ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / nam mkha' ltar chags pa med pas rnam par grol zhing gos pa med pa'i ting nge 'dzin te /
translated: the samadhi of the elimination of the faults of the mind, and the samadhi of liberation and non-attachment like space.

original: 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems @349b dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po zhes bya'o //
analyzed: 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems @349b dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po zhes bya'o //
translated: This is called the Mahayana of the bodhisattva mahasattva.

original: rab 'byor / gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po ni /🔽'di lta ste /
analyzed: rab 'byor / gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po ni / 'di lta ste /
translated: Furthermore, Subhuti, the Mahayana of the bodhisattva mahasattva is as follows:

original: nang stong pa nyid dang / phyi stong pa nyid dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang / chen po stong pa nyid dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid dang /
analyzed: nang stong pa nyid dang / phyi stong pa nyid dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang / chen po stong pa nyid dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid dang /
translated: The emptiness of internal phenomena, the emptiness of external phenomena, the emptiness of external and internal phenomena, the emptiness of emptiness, the emptiness of great immensity, the emptiness of ultimate reality, the emptiness of conditioned phenomena,

original: 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang / thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid dang / dor ba med pa stong pa nyid dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang /
analyzed: 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang / thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid dang / dor ba med pa stong pa nyid dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang /
translated: the emptiness of the unconditioned, the emptiness of the unlimited, the emptiness of that which has neither beginning nor end, the emptiness of non-dispersal, the emptiness of inherent existence, the emptiness of all phenomena,

original: rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang / mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa stong pa nyid dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid de /
analyzed: rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang / mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa stong pa nyid dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid de /
translated: the emptiness of intrinsic defining characteristics, the emptiness of non-apprehension, the emptiness of inherent identity, the emptiness of all things, and the emptiness of the intrinsic identity of non-entities.

original: 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po'o //
analyzed: 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po'o //
translated: This, Subhūti, is the Great Vehicle of the bodhisattva great beings.

original: rab 'byor / gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po ni 'di lta ste /
analyzed: rab 'byor / gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po ni 'di lta ste /
translated: “Furthermore, Subhūti, the Great Vehicle of the bodhisattva great beings is as follows:

original: dran pa nye bar bzhag pa bzhi dang / yang dag par spong ba bzhi dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dang / dbang po lnga dang / stobs lnga dang / byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang /🔽'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi dang / bsam gtan bzhi dang / tshad med pa bzhi dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar @350a *//
analyzed: dran pa nye bar bzhag pa bzhi dang / yang dag par spong ba bzhi dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dang / dbang po lnga dang / stobs lnga dang / byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi dang / bsam gtan bzhi dang / tshad med pa bzhi dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar @350a *//
translated: the four establishments of mindfulness, the four right efforts, the four legs of magical emanation, the five faculties, the five powers, the seven branches of enlightenment, and the eightfold noble path;🔽the four noble truths, the four concentrations, the four immeasurables, the four formless absorptions, the eight liberations,

original: gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / mngon par shes pa rnams dang / ting nge 'dzin rnams dang / gzungs kyi sgo rnams dang /
analyzed: gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / mngon par shes pa rnams dang / ting nge 'dzin rnams dang / gzungs kyi sgo rnams dang /
translated: the nine serial absorptions, the emptiness, signlessness, and wishlessness gateways to liberation, the clairvoyances, the meditative stabilizations, the dhāraṇī gateways,

original: de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad dag ste /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad dag ste /
translated: the ten powers of the Tathagata, the four grounds of self-confidence, the four analytical knowledges, great love, great compassion, and the eighteen special qualities of the Buddha.

original: 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po'o //🔽rab 'byor / gang yang khyod kyis 'di skad du theg pa de ni /
analyzed: 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po'o // rab 'byor / gang yang khyod kyis 'di skad du theg pa de ni /
translated: This is the Great Vehicle of the Bodhisattva, the great being.

original: lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan te 'byung bar 'gyur ro zhes smras pa ni /
analyzed: lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan te 'byung bar 'gyur ro zhes smras pa ni /
translated: Subhuti: You have said, “The vehicle will go forth having surpassed the world with its gods, men, and Asuras.”

original: lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten gang zhe na /🔽'di lta ste /
analyzed: lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten gang zhe na / 'di lta ste /
translated: What is the world with its gods, men, and Asuras?

original: 'dod pa'i khams dang / gzugs kyi khams dang / gzugs med pa'i khams te /🔽rab 'byor / gal te 'dod pa'i khams de bzhin /
analyzed: 'dod pa'i khams dang / gzugs kyi khams dang / gzugs med pa'i khams te / rab 'byor / gal te 'dod pa'i khams de bzhin /
translated: The world with its gods, men, and Asuras is the world of sense desire, the world of form, and the formless world.

original: ma nor ba de bzhin /🔽gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin te /
analyzed: ma nor ba de bzhin /🔽gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin te /
translated: If, Subhuti, the world of sense desire were an entity and not a non-entity,🔽the Bodhisattvas, the great beings, would not go forth to the knowledge of all modes for the complete conquest of the world with its gods, men, and Asuras.

original: phyin ci log ma yin la bden pa yang dag pa ste /
analyzed: phyin ci log ma yin la bden pa yang dag pa ste /
translated: If it were a thing that was not mistaken, true, and real,

original: ji lta ba bzhin du rtag cing brtan la ther zug mi 'gyur ba'i chos can gyi dngos po zhig yin na ni /
analyzed: ji lta ba bzhin du rtag cing brtan la ther zug mi 'gyur ba'i chos can gyi dngos po zhig yin na ni /
translated: that was permanent, stable, eternal, and unchanging,

original: theg pa chen po 'dis kyang lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan cing 'byung bar mi 'gyur te /
analyzed: theg pa chen po 'dis kyang lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan cing 'byung bar mi 'gyur te /
translated: then this Great Vehicle would not overpower and attain emancipation from the world with its gods, humans, and asuras.

original: rab 'byor / 'dod pa'i @350b khams de rnam par brtags pa /
analyzed: rab 'byor / 'dod pa'i @350b khams de rnam par brtags pa /
translated: Su­bhūti, the element of desire is imagined,

original: rnam par bskyed pa yongs su bsgrubs pa ste /
analyzed: rnam par bskyed pa yongs su bsgrubs pa ste /
translated: created, and accomplished,

original: mi rtag cing mi brtan la ther zug ma yin 'gyur ba'i chos can te /
analyzed: mi rtag cing mi brtan la ther zug ma yin 'gyur ba'i chos can te /
translated: and it is impermanent, unstable, not eternal, and is subject to change.

original: dngos po med pas de'i phyir theg pa chen po 'dis lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan te 'byung ba yin no //
analyzed: dngos po med pas de'i phyir theg pa chen po 'dis lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan te 'byung ba yin no //
translated: Since it is insubstantial, this Great Vehicle overpowers and attains emancipation from the world with its gods, humans, and asuras.

original: rab 'byor / gal te gzugs kyi khams de bzhin /🔽ma nor ba de bzhin /
analyzed: rab 'byor / gal te gzugs kyi khams de bzhin / ma nor ba de bzhin /
translated: Su­bhūti, if the element of form were the real,🔽unmistaken,

original: gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin te /
analyzed: gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin te /
translated: and unerring nature of things,

original: phyin ci log ma yin la bden pa yang dag pa ste /
analyzed: phyin ci log ma yin la bden pa yang dag pa ste /
translated: If it were not mistaken, but were true and real,

original: ji lta ba bzhin du rtag cing brtan la ther zug mi 'gyur ba'i chos can gyi dngos po zhig yin na ni /
analyzed: ji lta ba bzhin du rtag cing brtan la ther zug mi 'gyur ba'i chos can gyi dngos po zhig yin na ni /
translated: and if it were a thing that is permanent, enduring, eternal, and immutable,

original: theg pa chen po 'dis kyang lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan cing 'byung bar mi 'gyur te /
analyzed: theg pa chen po 'dis kyang lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan cing 'byung bar mi 'gyur te /
translated: then this Great Vehicle would not surpass and appear above the world with its gods, humans, and asuras.
